title: Enhancing Online Music Education Competencies through Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Music Theory and Experience with Digital Devices
context.additional_context: Targeting current music education practitioners, this program focuses on enhancing the design and implementation of effective music education in hybrid online-offline settings.

learning_goals: Participants can select and utilize at least three ICT tools and software suitable for music education.
Participants can plan music lesson designs by applying the DELP model (Device, Environment, Learning Focus, Pedagogy).
Participants can develop and implement two or more music performance assessment methods in blended learning environments.
Participants can execute three or more instructional strategies for online music education, such as providing feedback and facilitating interaction.

resources: Music Education Software (FL Studio, GarageBand, etc.)
Online Collaboration Tools (Google Jamboard, Padlet, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
